reviewText: I love this game! Not only because I'm currently the best player in the world, but also just generally :D Great feeling, great graphics, perfect amount of addictiveness :)\n\nGet it and beat me if you can ;)
voteText: 3 of 5 people (60%) found this review helpful

reviewText: This is a very polished and intense version of asteroids. The music and graphics are top notch and there are a lot of interesting gameplay mechanics in the combination of powerups. However, for me the game becomes too hard too fast and at that point mostly chaotic. I also think the player could have had more freedom of choise in what weapon to use and when.\n\nIf you like, fast, intense action and have a nack for getting the highscore this is definitely for you!
voteText: 2 of 4 people (50%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: The controls here are quite nice and it's a good followup to asteriods\n\nSo why am I not recommending it?  It's too freaking frustrating.  There's challenge and then there's UFOPILOT!  Playing this just makes me feel bad about myself :(
